title: Exhaust is such a useless spell
body: I mean, there's so much true damage and %health damage in this game what's the point. Oh, you exhausted the Vayne, Yi, etc? Too bad you're still taking true damage lol.

replies.body: Champs like vayne and yi are the entire reason this exists. It massively cuts their damage output. Very useful spell and frequently used by people who actually think about matchups.

> [{quoted}](name=MagicFlyingLlama,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1lXFjzay,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2016-12-17T03:08:10.311+0000)
>
> Champs like vayne and yi are the entire reason this exists. It massively cuts their damage output. Very useful spell and frequently used by people who actually think about matchups.

Yea exhaust REALLY helps against Yi and Vayne lol.
I agree completely, it has shut down tons of fed ADCs and saved countless fights.
But...it slows their attack speed, making still deal LESS true damage...which is the point...

> [{quoted}](name=Doctor Jarvis,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1lXFjzay,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-17T02:43:47.988+0000)
>
> But...it slows their attack speed, making still deal LESS true damage...which is the point...

There's no such thing as "less" true damage lol.
When the true damage comes out less often, less instances of it occur. Meaning less true damage.

> [{quoted}](name=Doctor Jarvis,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=1lXFjzay,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2016-12-17T03:05:21.055+0000)
>
> When the true damage comes out less often, less instances of it occur. Meaning less true damage.

There's so many better options for spells tho
lol, Exhaust is the best non-Flash summoner in the game.  Ignite is garbage.
